number.title: number of tabs before triggering discard

audio.title: audio = true => do not discard if audio is playing

pinned.title: pinned = true => do not discard if tab is pinned

form.title: form = true => do not discard if form data is changed

battery.title: battery = true => only discard if power is disconnected

online.title: online = true => do not discard if there is no INTERNET connection

page.context.title: Display discarding items in the "page" context menu

tab.context.title: Display discarding items in the "tab" context menu (if supported)

link.context.title: Display "Open Link in New Discarded Tab" item in the "link" context menu

click.title: Use "click.popup" to show browser action's popup menu

favicon.title: Change favicon of discarded tabs (if possible)

go-hidden.title: Discard a tab if it is hidden

memory-enabled.title: Discard a background tab based on its memory usage (totalJSHeapSize)

memory-value.title: Discard a background tab if its memory usage (totalJSHeapSize) exceeds (in MB)

simultaneous-jobs.title: Number of allowed simultaneous discarding jobs

favicon-delay.title: Delay for painting the discarded favicon (in milliseconds)

trash.period.title: Trash discarded tabs after about x hours if trash.enabled is true

startup-unpinned.title: Discard unpinned tabs on a browser restart

startup-pinned.title: Discard pinned tabs on a browser restart

startup-release-pinned.title: Release discarding state of pinned tabs on a browser restart

release-next-tab.title: Release discarding of the next tab if it is discarded
